text:
Yelena Lvovna Shushunova (; name sometimes rendered Elena Shushunova; 23 April 1969 – 16 August 2018) was a Russian World, European, and Olympic championship winning gymnast. Shushunova was one of five women who have won the grand slam of All-Around titles: Olympics, World Championships, European/Continental Championships. She was born in Leningrad.
Shushunova died from complications of pneumonia on August 16, 2018 in Saint Petersburg, aged 49.
